ModMetaData.name: Devil May Cry Weapons
ModMetaData.author: AIvanCP
ModMetaData.description:
Legendary weapons from the Devil May Cry universe have mysteriously appeared on the rim. These ancient artifacts of demonic power are incredibly rare and valuable.
Features: • 6 Legendary DMC weapons: Yamato, Blue Rose, Mirage Edge, Devil Sword Dante, Ebony & Ivory, and King Cerberus • Extremely rare - only available through special quests and high-end traders • Lore-accurate stats and descriptions • Player-exclusive weapons (no NPCs will spawn with these) • Expensive crafting requirements and research
These weapons are designed to be end-game content for veteran players seeking the ultimate arsenal.
